1.content: First off, who are you and what gender?
1.title: Let The Stories Commence

11.content:
(First off, Ven's an original character of mine. He's smart, kind of clever, comedic, and always ends up in troubles and stuff like that.)

Okay then, time for the stories to begin.

Which scenarios would Ven go for?
11.title: Ven's Moment To Shine

info.brief_description: Interactive stories of strange and interesting adventures. It's TransforMania!
info.description:
Ever wondered how is like if you're in a interactive story? That's where TransforMania came along.

There's many stories in here, some are strange, some are depressing, some are hilarious, and the others...well, a mix of all of them.

Anyway, now's the time for the rules:
------------------------------------------------RULES-------------------------------------------------
No sexual harassments.
Minimal violence only.
Please use proper grammar/spelling.

And that's about it. Hope you enjoy. If you had any ideas on how to make this interactive story better, you can PM me on this site. I wouldn't mind.
